# Ivermectin Research

> Evidence-based medical information on ivermectin research and applications

## About

Ivermectin Research provides comprehensive, peer-reviewed information about ivermectin, an FDA-approved antiparasitic medication. Our content covers medical uses, dosage guidelines, safety information, and the latest clinical research.
